author: boma_naps
content:
I have tests for eth-config; https://github.com/bomanaps/rpctestgen/tree/feat/eth_config.
I need to run them first, but I don’t have enough space on my local machine, and I’m currently trying to resolve connection issues on my remote instances.
As for the future block, I’m not sure how to go about testing it. This is one of the things we’re yet to finalize in our action items. But I was thinking of testing the block parameter functionality I’m not sure if that’s the right approach, so I’d like clarification on the future blocks test requirements.

author: .fjl
content: Just make a call with a block number which is higher than the latest block
